text: Each actor has brought something unique to the role, so Smith will have his work cut out. Matt Smith has time to come to terms to the task ahead, as current Doctor Who, David Tennant will not leave the BBC show until the end of 2009. Smith will play the time lord in 2010. Do you think Smith will make a great Doctor Who?
title: The show has been running for 45-years, and the fans of the show will always remember the ten actors who played Doctor Who before Smith, his name will now join that exclusive list.
